text: C. Vijaya Baskar, Minister for Health, on Saturday, declared open the part-time ration shops at Sengapatti and Mukkanamalaipatti near Viralimalai. He said the card-holders had hitherto trekked some distance to get their ration and hence the State government sanctioned the part-time shops close to their door-steps. S. Ganesh, District Collector, presided over the function.
title: Part-time rations shops opened
